statements: UPDATE EndangeredSpecies SET habitat = 'Tropical Rainforest', population_size = 1000 WHERE species_name = 'Bengal Tiger';

UPDATE EndangeredSpecies SET population_size=1000, conservation_status='Critically Endangered', habitat='Rainforest' WHERE species_name='Sumatran Elephant'
